task.title: Remove Existing Typewriter Ribbon
task.shortdesc: You can easily remove your typewriter ribbon by removing the ribbon cover and gently unthreading your ribbon.

taskbody.prereq: Before removing the ribbon, you will need to remove the ribbon cover on your typewriter.

step.cmd: Slowly lift one of the ribbon spools from its metal spool holder.
Gently pull the ribbon upwards and out of the auto-reversing bracket.
Repeat the above two steps for the second ribbon spool.
Locate the set of ribbon guides that are in front of the ribbon vibrator.
Carefully unthread the existing ribbon through the small slits in the ribbon guides.
